About

I am interested in applied machine learning. Previously I have worked on ML applications in finance, nlp, network analysis, and healthcare. In my spare time, I like connecting resources. I am running two alumni groups in the bay area: CMU & UIUC. I am also maintain WeFightCovid19.org and JobSupport.Club.

Projects

We Fight COVID-19

Daily updated case statistics of COVID-19 in the Bay Area with PPE donation map, community efforts, and other assistance information.

Job Support Club

A central resource center for people seeking job support in times of hardship
